definition: to travel around (the world, a country etc)
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
surname Huan
to walk/to tour/to roam/to travel
Around the World in Eighty Days by Jules Verne 儒勒·凡爾納|儒勒·凡尔纳[Ru2 le4 · Fan2 er3 na4]
pinyin: Ba1 shi2 Tian1 Huan2 you2 Di4 qiu2

sentences.english: He spent most of last week globetrotting in Germany and China.
sentences.chinese: 上週他花了好些時間環遊在德國和中國。

sentences.english: The birth of Christ is perhaps the most popular festival around the world.
sentences.chinese: 基督的誕生也許是最受歡迎的節日環遊世界。

sentences.english: It can guide you around in a city.
sentences.chinese: 他能帶領你在一個城市中環遊。

sentences.english: A herring once decided to swim right around the world.
sentences.chinese: 從前，有一條青魚決心要環遊世界。

sentences.english: Don’t worry about traveling the entire world —be delighted with the world around you.
sentences.chinese: 不要急着環遊世界，去尋找你身邊的美好。

sentences.english: He wants to hike round the world.
sentences.chinese: 他打算徒步旅行環遊世界一週。

sentences.english: We're traveling in throughout the United States.
Once, I backpacked around Europe and I brought an acoustic guitar with me.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，我輕裝環遊歐洲，隨身帶着一把原聲吉他。

sentences.english: Beijing Multi-campus Bike Ride Supports the International Day Against Homophobia.
sentences.chinese: 北京高校學生自行車環遊支持“國際不再恐同日”。

sentences.english: We took a cruise in the Carribbean.
sentences.chinese: 我們在加勒比海上作了一次環遊。

sentences.english: I jumped into the water and I was surrounded by reef sharks and red snappers.
sentences.chinese: 我跳入水中，四周環遊着珊瑚礁鯊和紅甲魚。

sentences.english: When I backpacked around Europe, I stayed in hostels to keep my expenses down.
sentences.chinese: 我輕裝環遊歐洲時，住在旅社裏降低旅行費用。

sentences.english: You can hire a bicycle from the bus station and ride around the city very safely.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在公交站租一輛自行車環遊桂林，非常安全。

sentences.english: This time, a teacher embarks on a nine-month around-the-world voyage.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，在九個月環遊了世界的航程老師出發。

sentences.english: He travels the world using a number of names and his adventures are the talk of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他以多個化名環遊世界，他的冒險也在巴黎傳頌一時。

sentences.english: Reykjavik is trendy with a lot of globetrotters nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 雷克雅未克現在是很多環遊世界者的新寵。

definition: paraglider/paragliding
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
lit. flower viewing from horseback (idiom); fig. superficial understanding from cursory observation/to make a quick judgment based on inadequate information
to try one's luck/to leave sth to chance
to catch the wind/to go for a spin in the fresh air
to set off/to start (on a journey)
free time (between organized activities)
to parachute/to bail out/parachute jumping
to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
encounter with a beautiful woman/romance/affair
to snorkel/snorkeling
to eat one's fill/to be full
Angkor Wat, temple complex in Cambodia
travel notes
roundabout (traffic island)/around an island (trip etc)
TV tower
